content: Hi all, I am new to using fhirbase and want to leverage fhirbase procedures to use in my node js application.. I came to know that as of now we don't have any as such connectors for node js. Can we expect it to be available anytime soon? Need help on this.Thanks
Hello @Pritam Kumar , yes we are working on it - you can expect fhirbase.js release in one month or contribute ;)

Is it appropriate/ possible to use this FHIR base schema:
https://github.com/fhirbase/fhirbase/blob/master/schema/fhirbase-4.0.0.sql.json
With Asymmetrik's node-fhir-server-core plugin?
